content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'raw_storagefinalcompass_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [raw_storagefinalcompass_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@storagefinalcompass.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Dimension_City (
	[CityKey] int,
	[WWICityID] int,
	[City] nvarchar(4000),
	[StateProvince] nvarchar(4000),
	[Country] nvarchar(4000),
	[Continent] nvarchar(4000),
	[SalesTerritory] nvarchar(4000),
	[Region] nvarchar(4000),
	[Subregion] nvarchar(4000),
	[LatestRecordedPopulation] bigint,
	[ValidFrom] datetime2(7),
	[ValidTo] datetime2(7),
	[LineageKey] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Dimension/City/Dimension.City.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [raw_storagefinalcompass_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Dimension_City
GO
